subject: Music
title: Eminem Crosses the Color Line
description: A 60-second lesson on Eminem Crosses the Color Line.

hook.text: A white rapper from Detroit became the best-selling hip-hop artist of all time.

buildup.text: Eminem battled for respect in Detroit's underground scene where being white was a disadvantage.

discovery.text: Dr. Dre heard his demo tape and recognized technical brilliance regardless of skin color.

twist.text: His success forced hip-hop to question who could authentically participate in Black culture.

climax.text: His verbal skill was undeniable â€” even skeptics admitted he was among the greatest ever.

punchline.text: Talent has no color. The mic proved it.
